QuestData.Title: Gather Friends
QuestData.Description:
Outside is dangerous.
It is safe in the Kelfin Pocket.
We find the lost crabs, and slugs, and other friends.
Here they get a new name and a new home.
Find friends like these, and bring them home.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Sandclaw Crabs and Muck Creepers for Narm.
